verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How lovely is Your dwelling place newline Oh Lord Almighty newline For my soul longs and even faints for You newline For here my heart is satisfied newline within Your presence newline I sing beneath the shadow of Your wings

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Better is One day in Your courts newline Better is One day in Your house newline Better is One day in Your courts newline Than thousands elsewhere newline Better is One day in Your courts newline Better is One day in Your house newline Than thousands elsewhere

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: One thing I ask and I would seek newline To see Your beauty newline To find You in the place Your glory Dwells

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: My heart and flesh cry out newline For You're the living God newline You're Spirit's water to my soul newline I've tasted and I've seen newline Come once again to me newline I will draw near to You newline I will draw near to You
